name: Rootbot
description:
The project revolves around managing the constantly growing roots that sprouted from some sort of houseplant disaster. Since there is no time to use doors, our brave Rootbot is required to pull the roots by picking the whole house up above his head. Not a small feat, you must admit. He's just built different.

Future iterations may include exciting stuff such as an uprooting minigame, building throwing physics or even root entanglement disaster management.

Right now just make sure the roots wont reach lava. It's really bad for the roots and the Rootbot doesn't want to deal with any of it.
